Description:
Al Amal Business Solutions is looking for a highly motivated and organized Maintenance Technician to join a team in an ULTRA LUXURY RESORT in Saudi Arabia. In this role, you will be responsible for conducting repairs and maintenance tasks on the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems, as well as conducting preventative maintenance of the hotel and its equipment's.Perform daily inspections and routine maintenance of the hotel, equipment and systems to ensure their efficient operation. (Carpenter/Electrician/Kitchen & Laundry/General maintenance, General construction/HVAC/Plumber)
Perform repairs of the hotel as needed and mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems in the hotel to ensure optimal functionality.
Monitor, troubleshoot, and repair HVAC equipment and systems.
Conduct preventative maintenance on equipment and systems to prevent breakdowns or malfunctions.
Complete work orders and document all maintenance and repair activities using our computerized maintenance management system (CMMS).
Ensure compliance with safety regulations and standards.
Communicate with guests, contractors, and other team members to coordinate maintenance and repair activities.Job Details
